dynamicViews.description: Shows the sequence of interactions for creating a new ticket.

relationships.description: Requests list of subjects to display
Displays all subjects to choose from

Displays form to fill after subject is chosen
Fill the form including teacher to teach the ticket and room to hold it
Sends data requested for ticket creation
Returns whether the ticket is valid
Returns whether the ticket does not collide with other resrvations

Returns whether the ticket was created or colliding tickets
Sends result to display to user

dynamicViews.description: Shows the process for a student to view a subject's schedule.

relationships.description: Sends request to search for a subject by name

Requests schedule for the selected subject
Fetches tickets related to the subject
Returns schedule data for the subject
Displays schedule table with navigation options for weeks
